ygData.subject: Re: Grim Aura
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/14/99 7:08:51 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... lately. ... I see it more and more... with a current Channeling of 100... I was being attacked
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/14/99 7:08:51 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
shdwpanther@... writes:

> "You regain your concentration and continue casting!"
>
> Ever see that message? It seems to be happening more and more to me
lately.
> If I remember right off of the top of my head, both my Dex and Int is 90.
>
> Very cool when that happens.
>

I see it more and more... with a current Channeling of 100... I was being
attacked by 5 critters... and STILL got a gate off (seeing that message
above...) Channeling and dex help that :)

Sonoroud
